Package fr.insalyon.model

Class Tour

java.lang.Object
fr.insalyon.model.Tour
public class Tour extends Object
A sequence of deliveries located on a single path and handled by a courier.
See Also:

    Constructor
    Description
    Tour(Courier courier)
    Construct a new tour with no deliveries Instantiate an empty list of deliveries and the path with an empty list of segments The start intersection is the warehouse, the end intersection is set at null
